channel.title: Making a server using a winterlove v.2 base (Very Clean)
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]Hello, and welcome to my development thread.[/size][/center]
I've started a project on a winterlove v.2 base, which is an incredibly clean base. So those of you who come on here saying "r0fl this sux gtfo", it's a clean base, and I started on it two days ago. So not much has been added. I have made some slightly substantial advancements though.
I haven't decided what to name the server yet, so suggestions on that would be great.
First off, I'll put the skills list here. The ones in green are complete, the yellow ones are being worked on, and the red ones are not started on or complete.
Attack Defence Strength Hitpoints Range Prayer Magic Cooking Woodcutting Fletching Fishing Firemaking Crafting Smithing Mining Herblore Agility Thieving Slayer Farming Runecrafting
I know this list isn't very impressive, but I think it's fairly good considering I started two days ago.
Next up, the update log! [code] Monday, September 6: Added Shops!! Friday, September 3: Finished Mining Friday, September 3: Finished Runecrafting and Thieving Friday, September 3: Finished Range and Mage Friday, September 3: Added High-scores (Credits to deathschaos9) Friday, September 3: Removed a lot of unneeded methods and useless code from the Server and the Client Tuesday, August 31: Finished Cooking Tuesday, August 31: Started Fishing and Crafting Tuesday, August 31: Fixed Banking :) Monday, August 30: Fixed Combat Sunday, August 29: Fixed all gloves and boots to go into the correct spots Sunday, August 29: Downloaded Source [/code]
As you can see, I haven't done too much to it :P
Last but not least, because I know you will all flip shits, pictures!
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/vct8hf.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/mrer6a.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/w0j8et.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2464104.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2gwvz8z.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/hvujd4.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/65qsnb.jpg[/img]
High-scores (Thanks deathschaos9) [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/15x4wf5.jpg[/img]
[center][size=18pt]So, that's my thread! Any suggestions for the name or ways I could improve the server would be great![/size][/center]

item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

marcbob:

Looks good but no one likes to play these types of servers unfortuanately. You need like 30+ people wanting to play this and know some people with alot of subscribers on youtube if you want to be successful

I probably won’t host this, I’ll most likely just finish it and release as a base for people to use.

item.title: Making a server using a winterlove v.2 base (Very Clean)
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:10, topic:358063”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=454575.msg3328667#msg3328667 date=1283292884]

no winterlove = fail excuse for a java server

Wait does that mean:

winterlove = fail excuse for a java server

Or did you compliment wL?

thats means it should stop being used
[/quote]

I’m going to try to make it different than other wL’s or Deltas, (and by different I mean better) if that makes sense.

And `jeba, I actually agree with you. But this is a hobby, and I find it fun.[/quote]

not possible just use hyperion its 100X better + i would support this if u did

Read full topic

item.title: Making a server using a winterlove v.2 base (Very Clean)
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote="`jeba, post:2, topic:358063"]Forgive me if I’m wrong, but I thought wLv2 came with banking? Considering wLv3 has way to many things added for it just to be one update :s

Also, wLv3 is rather messy with repeated methods and unused things, I can imagine wLv2 will have the same :s[/quote]

To tell the truth, it was an easy fix, the bank lines were commented out

Yes, I’m removing those at the moment, i just didn’t add it in the OP because I thought no one here in this community would give a damn

Read full topic

item.title: Making a server using a winterlove v.2 base (Very Clean)
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Hello, and welcome to my development thread.[/size][/center]

I’ve started a project on a winterlove v.2 base, which is an incredibly clean base. So those of you who come on here saying “r0fl this sux gtfo”, it’s a clean base, and I started on it two days ago. So not much has been added. I have made some slightly substantial advancements though.

I haven’t decided what to name the server yet, so suggestions on that would be great.

First off, I’ll put the skills list here. The ones in green are complete, the yellow ones are being worked on, and the red ones are not started on or complete.

Attack
Defence
Strength
Hitpoints
Range
Prayer
Magic
Cooking
Woodcutting
Fletching
Fishing
Firemaking
Crafting
Smithing
Mining
Herblore
Agility
Thieving
Slayer
Farming
Runecrafting

I know this list isn’t very impressive, but I think it’s fairly good considering I started two days ago.

Next up, the update log!

Monday, September 6: Added Shops!!
Friday, September 3: Finished Mining
Friday, September 3: Finished Runecrafting and Thieving
Friday, September 3: Finished Range and Mage
Friday, September 3: Added High-scores (Credits to deathschaos9)
Friday, September 3: Removed a lot of unneeded methods and useless code from the Server and the Client
Tuesday, August 31: Finished Cooking
Tuesday, August 31: Started Fishing and Crafting
Tuesday, August 31: Fixed Banking :)
Monday, August 30: Fixed Combat
Sunday, August 29: Fixed all gloves and boots to go into the correct spots
Sunday, August 29: Downloaded Source

As you can see, I haven’t done too much to it

Last but not least, because I know you will all flip shits, pictures!
